amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the $1 billion appropriation in the bill for assistance to Turkey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $1 billion appropriation in the bill for assistance to Turkey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 315 (Roll no. 105).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
